display_long_description:
“It might just be the best shooter the Meta Quest 3 has to offer” – TechRadar

“A lot of heart and near infinite replayability” – FandomWire (9/10)

“...a classic, and you won't be disappointed” – GodisaGeek (9/10)


# WELCOME TO CULT ACTION PARADISE
 
Leap into the **VENDETTA FOREVER: DEMO** now!  Get a free hands-on with six frantic scenes and experience the future of the frenetic shooter. 

**VENDETTA FOREVER** fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay, effortless acrobatic style and the all-new LO-KILL-MOTION mechanic, to create an unapologetic love letter to classic action cinema. 
 
# POWERED BY LO-KILL-MOTION
[media]
Shoot to kill. Kill to move.  Dispatch foes and seize their weapon in mid-air to propel yourself forward. Strategically plot your next move with each takedown in a frantic fight to the bitter end. 
 
# RINSE, REPEAT, RELOAD – PREPARE FOR LAUNCH!
[media]
Hone your skills, as this is just a taste of the frenetic action to come. In the full release, you’ll rampage through 60 snackable slices of ultra-stylish strategic shooting with an outrageous arsenal of iconic weaponry. 

Check out the full game page for more: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/vendetta-forever/9177531962317371/
